attributes.action: Make water free and available on all airlines in and out of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Airlines currently not offering free, clean and drinkable water: 
RyanAir
Wizz Air
attributes.background: Clean drinkable water should be free to all passengers onboard all flights. At present, you have two choices, purchase over prices bottle water or be offered to drink out of the bathroom sink, which is cloudy and not clean.
